STEPS.STEP: Chop parsley stems off and chop leaves, crush 2 cloves of garlic and chop the other 2.
Pour enough olive oil to coat bottom of pan and add the chopped garlic and parsley stems, cook on low heat for a few minutes
Remove parsley and garlic and then add the minced garlic and the chilli flakes, then cook for about 2 mins till garlic is nice and toasted.
Add the tomatoes and crush them up, add pinch of salt and a little bit of sugar, cook for about 10-15 mins.
Heavily salt pasta water and cook penne then remove pasta from water and add to sauce along with some pasta water, when ready add a load of parsley and mix then serve with parmesan
